This folder is reserved for the eSpeak NG (Next Generation) Text-to-Speech engine used for voice output in the KNNProject.

You may include:
- The source files or built binaries of eSpeak NG
- Necessary headers and configuration files

Note:
- The actual `espeak-ng.exe` file is not included in this repository to avoid uploading compiled binaries.
- You can download or build eSpeak NG from the official GitHub repository:
  https://github.com/espeak-ng/espeak-ng

- After building or downloading it, place the `espeak-ng.exe` in your `src/` folder or update the voice path in your code accordingly.
